amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a new section at the end of the bill (before the short title) stating that none of the funds made available in the Act may be made available for the assignment of any United States military personnel for temporary or permanent duty in Colombia if that assignment would cause the number of United States military personnel so assigned to exceed 550.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Farr amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Farr.
